channel.title: Can't use ANY Objects!
channel.description:
I'v been having this problem for a long time, when anyone on the server Does an action on an object (like Use/Enter Portal Take from Table etc.) All users in the area logout including them. Heres a pic of the error: First I click the option: [img]http://allgofree.redirectme.net/rs/pics/err1.jpg[/img] Then it has the error: [img]http://allgofree.redirectme.net/rs/pics/err2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://allgofree.redirectme.net/rs/pics/err3.jpg[/img]
Please can someone help me fix this, I worked really hard on the server and don't want to have to recode it. (And I has this problem before I changed anything) :'(
This happens for object with AND withOUT cases to handler them. :(
